title: Exclude from Sitemap
description: Schema for defining paths that should be excluded from the sitemap as well as patterns that should only appear once in the sitemap at the root level.

slug.description: The slug that appears at the end of URLs (e.g., 'contact'). Should be defined in the default language.

variations.description: Variations of the slug for different languages (default language not included).

items.description: The path to exclude from the sitemap. Must include all slugs(including localization) but not protocol. eg.: '/some-example-path'.
